name: Clockwork Clash
description:
Clockwork CLash

In Clockwork Clash you'll play as a kid with a bright imagination who will use an old cuckoo as a character in a story played in his imagination. Feel the pressure of time as you fight against your own imagination and the clock to save your living room from an evil robot!

How to play

Move your character with WASD and shoot with left-click. Don't forget to go back to the clock pressing right-click before you run out of time!
